title: 'This is meant to distract': Trump flip flops on agreeing to peaceful transfer of power
description: With early voting underway, a new Supreme Court Justice nominee and less than 40 days until Election Day, President Donald Trump may have changed his tune on whether he would commit to a peaceful transfer of power if he loses. However, Trump continues to
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: 'In my heart, I feel that the police department are murderers': Demonstrators in Louisville, Kentucky demand for justice for Breonna Taylor following grand jury decision
description: Protesters are demanding justice for Breonna Taylor and increased transparency following a grand jury’s decision against directly charging any of the Louisville Metro Police officers with her death. MSNBC political reporter Shaquille Brewster explores what pr…
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Putting those concerns of creeping authoritarianism into perspective
description: NBC’s Joshua Johnson explains how, even though some say the US is slipping into authoritarianism, particularly with the President refusing to commit to a peaceful transfer of power, there’s some context to consider: just look around the globe.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Colorado Secy. of State Jena Griswold on mail-in voting: ‘The era of long lines should end’
description: Colorado Secretary of State Jena Griswold calls for the state’s all-mail electoral system to be adopted nationwide and says she’s 2-0 on lawsuits to protect voting rights.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Sen. Doug Jones: ‘This is a battle for the heart and soul of the Senate’
description: Democratic Sen. Doug Jones of Alabama says Republicans’ push to confirm Amy Coney Barrett to the Supreme Court is a “political power grab” that will undermine confidence in Congress.
source.name: MSNBC

title: Colorado voters discuss policing and criminal justice: ‘What happened to Breonna Taylor was horrific’
description: Voters in Pueblo, Colorado discuss nationwide protests and police reform with MSNBC’s Ali Velshi on the third stop of his “Velshi Across America 2020” tour, which will cover eight swing states before the election.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Planned Parenthood president on threat to reproductive rights: ‘Roe v. Wade is the floor, not the ceiling’
description: Alexis McGill Johnson, president of Planned Parenthood and its Action PAC, and Fatima Goss Graves, president of the National Women’s Law Center, discuss Trump Supreme Court nominee Amy Coney Barrett’s record on abortion access and the Affordable Care Act.
source.name: MSNBC

title: Polls show Biden in stable lead before debate. Is this accurate?
description: Donald Trump trailing Joe Biden before the presidential debates kick off is analyzed by politics experts. Pollster and podcast host Fernand Amandi tells Tiffany Cross, ‘These are not debates. Biden should not be treating these as debates. What these are,
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Legal expert alleges ‘Amy Coney Barrett already sits in stolen seat’
description: Donald Trump Supreme Court pick Amy Coney Barrett is critiqued by legal expert Elie Mystal. Mystal tells Tiffany Cross, ‘Democrats have to do a better job messaging to their base about how important the courts are.’
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Sen. Blumenthal: I refuse to treat Barrett nomination as fair
description: Amy Coney Barrett’s Supreme Court nomination is slammed by Sen. Richard Blumenthal. Blumenthal tells Tiffany Cross, ‘ I have no intention of meeting with Judge Barrett.’
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Biden: President Trump is trying to throw out the Affordable Care Act
description: Democratic presidential nominee Joe Biden made remarks in Wilmington Del., where he responded to President Trump’s SCOTUS selection on Amy Coney Barrett, and says Trump is trying to "throw out" the Affordable Care Act while still in a global health crisis.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Proud Boys hate group fails to draw thousands to Portland
description: Portland is largely peaceful after a hate group rally organized by the Proud Boys. Tiffany Cross and her panel discuss the rally, and the rise of White nationalist groups during the Trump era.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Chelsea Clinton’s new children’s book: ‘She Persisted in Sports’
description: Chelsea Clinton discusses her new children’s book and the 2020 election. Clinton joins Tiffany Cross to discuss, ‘She Persisted in Sports: American Olympians Who Changed the Game.’
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Wildfire in Napa County causes mandatory evacuations at nearby hospital
description: The Adventist Health St. Helena hospital has been forced to stop all medical treatment and transfer patients due to the Glass Fire spreading so quickly in Napa County, Calif.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Fears loom Amy Coney Barrett will help strike down ACA
description: Amy Coney Barrett could help overturn Obamacare in the middle of the coronavirus pandemic experts say. Author and scholar Brittney Cooper joins Tiffany Cross to discuss.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Yasmin Vossoughian: "Your Vote Does Make A Difference"
description: In her weekly segment, #therun, MSNBC’s Yasmin Vossoughian gives her thoughts why voting matters, and examines the reasons why some people don’t go to the polls.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Young activist says voting key tool against conservative agenda
description: March for Our Lives co-founder David Hogg critiques Amy Coney Barrett as Donald Trump’s Supreme Court pick, and says voting among the young is a key tool against what he describes as the conservative agenda.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: HBCU leaders: Blacks should join COVID-19 vaccine trials
description: African-Americans are disproportionately impacted by the coronavirus pandemic. Tiffany Cross and her panel of HBCU leaders explain their views on why and how black people can participate.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Benjamin Crump on AG Daniel Cameron: Breonna Taylor may have been 'collateral damage for his political expediency'
description: Family attorney Benjamin Crump demands transparency from Attorney General Daniel Cameron in Breonna Taylor case - prompting release of grand jury transcript.
source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: NYT obtains two decades of Trump’s tax returns revealing years of tax avoidance
description: The New York Times obtained President Trump’s tax information extending over more than two decades. Reporting reveals that Trump paid 750 dollars in federal income taxes the year he won the presidency and paid zero income taxes in ten of the previous 15 years…
source.name: MSNBC
